metadata.title: CVE-2023-52871 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:soc: qcom: llcc: Handle a second device without data corruptionUsually there is only one llcc device. But if there were a second, evena failed probe call would modify the global drv_data pointer. So checkif drv_data is valid before overwriting it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
